replies.body:
{{champion:89}} : Don't worry Sivir, we have this. I'll stun lock the ADC and you kite.
{{champion:15}} : I cannot Leona, I used my ult just seconds before and I only have 2 auto hits of health left.
{{champion:89}} : No, we have it.. okay going in!
{{champion:15}} : Pl-please don't.
{{champion:89}} : SIVIR WTF HELP
{{champion:15}} : I cannot! D:
{{champion:89}} : %%%% noob ADC.
{{champion:15}} : I'm sorry, I was almost dead
{{champion:89}} : %%%%ing trash, gg bot no double kill because Sivir is a %%%%%.
{{champion:15}} : ...
{{champion:89}} : Has disconnected

Your riveting tale is missing something quite important---

{{champion:15}} : Leona? Don't go! All my life I've been craving for my soulmate...
{{champion:15}} : I've been lonely this whole entire time...
{{champion:89}} : Has reconnected
{{champion:89}} : ...
{{champion:89}} : R-really? Do you truly feel that our love can break all bounds?
{{champion:15}} : Everyday I see you, protecting me from Pantheon mains... 
{{champion:15}} : Being my one and true support...the support I love...
{{champion:89}} : B-baka~! You only see me as a warding machine! You just want to win the game!
{{champion:15}} : Leona, you know that's not true. I care about you just as much as my LP
{{champion:89}} : Sivir...hold me!
{{champion:75}} : (Morgan Freeman)
{{champion:75}} : As the sun set, the two embraced in each other in their sweaty body heat. 
{{champion:75}} : Sounds of soft moans echoed throughout the night.
{{champion:75}} : If you listen carefully, you can still hear their ecstasy...

Written by M. Night Shyamalan.
What about the sequel where Sivir Spell Shields Pantheon's spears?

I had this same thing although not with Sivir and leona, I was adc had like 300 health against two, tank went in, I ran for my life.

This is similar to life as naught 
Lumbering into a 1v5, engaging a 1v5, sitting in a 1v5 for a while, realising your team isn't following, lumbering out of a 1v5.
I at one point mained Leo and can confirm this is exactly what it is like.

See, I sit and read the forums and think to myself, am I the only one who rocks the outrageously fabulous PINK TARIC?!

They be all, 
Team ADC: GO LEONA AND STUN LOCK TEHM SO I CAN DO STO0F!!

MysticalRaven:... Trust in the pink, together, we will be fabulously splendidly outrageous.

Team ADC: FFS!!! SICK OF %%%%TY SUPPORTS.

-end of match; victory

Team ADC: Better than Leona.

I pray pink turic also!!



Only in the jg or top tho.

Rumble x Tristy: uhh no i want to go leona havent played her in a while

Rumble x Tristy: sorry mate..

*Game starts*

{{champion:5}} soz if u dont go who i want i dont go who u want
{{champion:89}} gg...

Trust in the heart of the Leona :)

source: Leona main
if it is an ap leona with death cap and hasn't fed or fallen behind too hard u might have a chance at instagibbing them

Yes let's praise it!

y sivir no priase? What a casual, go get rekt by daddy.
Hmm this is true I have never noticed.
lol its funny cause i do this all the time with my friends when i make some plays

Every time i play Leona, i feel like it's my duty to go ham.
Ain't no time for a 'passive' Leona.
